definition: copper (chemistry)/see also 紅銅|红铜[hong2 tong2]/CL:塊|块[kuai4]

sentences.english: The induced-flotation behavior of chalcopyrite and pyrite was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 考察了黄铜矿和黄铁矿的诱导浮选行为。

sentences.english: Figure 2 Anodic polarization curves of chrome steel samples in simulative mineral slurry.
sentences.chinese: 图2铬钢试样在模拟铜矿浆中的阳极极化曲线。

sentences.english: Sublevel caving method without sill pillar is adopted in the south section of Fengshan Copper Mine.
sentences.chinese: 丰山铜矿南缘采区应用无底柱分段崩落法采矿。

sentences.english: Structural features of the Yagra copper deposit in Deqen, Yunnan;
sentences.chinese: 滇西羊拉铜矿是近年来发现的大型铜矿床。

sentences.english: The production practice confirms that this flotation process can be adopted to treat Yunlong refractory silver-copper ore.
sentences.chinese: 生产实践证明该工艺可作为云龙银铜矿的选矿工艺。

sentences.english: The copper producer will take delivery of half the ore, he said.
sentences.chinese: 他还表示，这家铜生产商将提取一半的铜矿石。

sentences.english: Leaching of copper from chalcocite with acidic acetonitrilecopper sulphate system was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了用酸性乙腈硫酸铜体系从辉铜矿中提取铜。

sentences.english: An investigation is made of the catalyzing behavior of silver ions in bacterial leaching of chalcopyrite.
sentences.chinese: 对银离子催化细菌浸出黄铜矿进行了研究。

sentences.english: The Dajing copper mining and smelting relic site is the earliest one found in the northern China.
sentences.chinese: 大井矿冶遗址是我国北方发现最早的一处古铜矿遗址。

sentences.english: The Dexing copper mine in Jiangxi Province is a porphyry copper ore field of veinlet-disseminated type.
sentences.chinese: 江西德兴铜矿是一个细脉浸染型斑岩铜矿田。

sentences.english: The Dexing copper mine in Jiangxi Province is a porphyry copper ore field of veinlet-disseminated type.
sentences.chinese: 江西德兴铜矿是一个细脉浸染型斑岩铜矿田。
埃斯康迪达铜矿主要生产铜精矿。

sentences.english: The Na 2S-induced flotation behavior of chalcopyrite and pyrite has been investigated.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了黄铜矿，黄铁矿的硫化钠诱导浮选行为。

sentences.english: The mineral processing of Tangdan refractory copper oxide ores is a worldwide difficult problem.
sentences.chinese: 汤丹难选氧化铜矿的选矿是一个世界难题。

sentences.english: Tetrahedrite minerals in different types of gold deposits have different characteristic parameters.
sentences.chinese: 在不同类型金矿中，黝铜矿具有不同的特征参数。

definition: to extract (ore or other resource from a mine)/to exploit/to mine
remaining quantity/reserves (of natural resources, oil etc)
